extendedInfo.description: -- This is a Lite version --CLICK HERE to find the full version.**** Allaboutsymbian.com review: "A good adventure game which can be recommended to anyone interested in the genre. There's no simple-minded action here, the puzzles do demand that you think about them so you can solve them. But if you're into adventure games then that's exactly what you want to hear." ******** Softonic.com review: "On the whole, it is a captivating game that perfectly recreates the old graphical adventure genre to help transport you back to the 80s." ******** Handango.com "CrazySoft team strikes back with this excellent game that offers an intriguing adventure, intelligent gameplay, clever puzzles and good lasting appeal. Highly recommended!" ****The Final Battle is a funny adventure game which reminds us the old classic ones. The plot is happening at the age of the knights. Your character is a guy which wakes up in a prison cell with amnesia. He doesnât even know who he is! Your task is to escape from the prison and find out the entire story behind your capture. And of course try to stay alive...FEATURES:â¢ Huge game (over 50 places!)â¢ Fantastic cartoon graphics.â¢ Deep story with many turnovers.â¢ Amazing music and sounds.â¢ Funny dialogs that will make you laugh.â¢ Fully translated into several languages.â¢ Pure adventure riddles and puzzles.â¢ Funny cinematic scenesâ¢ Automatic save and continue system which saves up to the last click.â¢ export your Hi-Score online and compare it with everybody.

reviews.title: An Old Favourite
reviews.comment: I\'ve been playing this one since the HTC Tilt Windows Mobile phone in 2006! The dialogue is exquisitely funny, fresh. Gameplay still stumps me sometimes! The music is my favourite thing, though. Modern crap rap meets 80s throwback. Can\'t be beat!! 3.99$ on Crazysoft.com.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Purchased through Amazon\'s app store. Game\'s buggy bc it doesn\'t always remember where you left off, so you have to keep redoing some levels!!!

reviews.comment: Stupid, like the authors story. The game thinks putting rocks in a bucket is idiotic and stupid... hmm. Ok.

reviews.title: Wtf permissions?
reviews.comment: I bought this months ago & have played a little. It is fun. Now it wants to update with new permissions to read sms. Why does it need this? I want my $ back.
